languages.text: "Молчи, и не противься спасению! Наши дети прозрели, а ты все еще веришь в ложь!" {n}Увидев вас, мужчина наводит на вас оружие. Другие мятежники делают то же самое.{/n} "Кто ты и зачем здесь?"

traits.locale_text: "Молчи, Тилла, и не противься спасению!" {n}Мужчина крепко сжимает окровавленное оружие.{/n} "Наши дети прозрели, а ты все еще веришь в ложь!" {n}Увидев вас, мужчина наводит на вас оружие. Другие мятежники делают то же самое.{/n} "Кто ты и зачем здесь?"

languages.text: "Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"
languages.original_text: "Молчи, и не противься спасению! Наши дети прозрели, а ты все еще веришь в ложь!" {n}Увидев вас, мужчина наводит на вас оружие. Другие мятежники делают то же самое.{/n} "Кто ты и зачем здесь?"

traits.locale_text: "Stop talking and stop refusing to be saved! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. Other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

"Stop talking and stop refusing to be saved! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. Other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

"Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

"Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

"Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

"Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

languages.text: "Hört auf zu reden und akzeptiert die Erlösung! Unseren Kindern wurden die Augen geöffnet, Ihr dagegen glaubt noch immer die Lüge!" {n}Als er dich sieht, richtet der Mann seine Waffe auf dich. Die anderen Aufständischen tun es ihm gleich.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr und was wollt Ihr hier?"
languages.original_text: "Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf zu reden und akzeptiert die Erlösung! "Unseren Kindern wurden die Augen geöffnet, Ihr dagegen glaubt noch immer die Lüge!" {n}Als er dich sieht, richtet der Mann seine Waffe auf dich. Die anderen Aufständischen tun es ihm gleich.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr und was wollt Ihr hier?"

languages.text: « Cessez de parler et acceptez la rédemption ! Nos enfants ont accédé à la vision véritable, alors que vous continuez à croire au mensonge ! » {n}En vous voyant, l'homme pointe son arme sur vous. Les autres insurgés en font de même.{/n} « Qui êtes-vous et que faites-vous là ? »
languages.original_text: "Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: « Cessez de parler et acceptez la rédemption ! Nos enfants ont accédé à la vision véritable, alors que vous continuez à croire au mensonge ! » {n}En vous voyant, l'homme pointe son arme sur vous. Les autres insurgés en font de même.{/n} « Qui êtes-vous et que faites-vous là ? »

languages.text: “不准说话，拥抱救赎！我们的孩子已经看到了真相，可你却还在相信谎言！”{n}他看到你之后，立刻将武器对准了你，其他叛乱分子也跟着照做。{/n}“你是什么人？为什么会在这里？”
languages.original_text: "Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: “不准说话，拥抱救赎！我们的孩子已经看到了真相，可你却还在相信谎言！”{n}他看到你之后，立刻将武器对准了你，其他叛乱分子也跟着照做。{/n}“你是什么人？为什么会在这里？”

languages.text: 「おしゃべりはやめて、贖罪を受け入れろ！お前らが未だに嘘を信じている間、我々の子供たちは真の光を手に入れた！」{n}あなたを見るや、男は武器をあなたに向けた。他の反乱者たちも同じようにした。{/n}「お前は誰だ。何を求めている？」
languages.original_text: "Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: 「おしゃべりはやめて、贖罪を受け入れろ！お前らが未だに嘘を信じている間、我々の子供たちは真の光を手に入れた！」{n}あなたを見るや、男は武器をあなたに向けた。他の反乱者たちも同じようにした。{/n}「お前は誰だ。何を求めている？」

languages.text: «¡Deja de hablar y acepta la redención! ¡Nuestros hijos han adquirido la verdadera visión, mientras que vosotros seguís creyendo en la mentira!». {n}Al verte, el hombre te apunta con su arma. Los otros insurgentes hacen lo mismo.{/n} «¿Quién eres y por qué estás aquí?».
languages.original_text: "Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Deja de hablar y acepta la redención! ¡Nuestros hijos han adquirido la verdadera visión, mientras que vosotros seguís creyendo en la mentira!». {n}Al verte, el hombre te apunta con su arma. Los otros insurgentes hacen lo mismo.{/n} «¿Quién eres y por qué estás aquí?».

languages.text: "Konuşmayı kes ve kurtuluşu kucakla! Sen hâlâ yalanlara inanırken çocuklarımız gözlerini açtı!" {n}Adam seni görünce silahını sana doğrultuyor. Keza diğer isyancılar da öyle.{/n} "Kimsin ve burada ne işin var?"
languages.original_text: "Stop talking and embrace redemption! Our children have gained true sight, while you still believe the lie!" {n}Upon seeing you, the man points his weapon at you. The other insurgents do the same.{/n} "Who are you and why are you here?"

traits.locale_text: "Konuşmayı kes ve kurtuluşu kucakla! Sen hâlâ yalanlara inanırken çocuklarımız gözlerini açtı!" {n}Adam seni görünce silahını sana doğrultuyor. Keza diğer isyancılar da öyle.{/n} "Kimsin ve burada ne işin var?"
